name: V_EHI_PBI_FILTER_STATIC
description: This view supports extracting RTF data for EHI from the invoice masterfile.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the invoice record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This item contains the subscriber patient Id of a coverage and will be used to associate patients with linked premium billing accounts for EHI.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
